title: JESUS, SEX, AND THE FAMILY A conversation with Dale Martin (2)
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: What was the sexuality of the historical Jesus?  Did he have romantic partners?  What did Jesus and Paul teach about teach about the desirability or permissibility of sex, what where their views on the family, and how should all of that impact how we live today?
